mapper.select: select branchid "branchid", branchname "branchname", parentid "parentid", branchtype "branchtype", province "province", city "city", county "county", stertreet "stertreet", showorder "showorder", curnumber "curnumber" from cas.branch where branchid = #{branchid} for update

select branchid "branchid", branchname "branchname", parentid "parentid", branchtype "branchtype", province "province", city "city", county "county", stertreet "stertreet", showorder "showorder", curnumber "curnumber" from cas.branch where branchid = #{branchid}

select branchid "branchid", branchname "branchname", parentid "parentid", branchtype "branchtype", province "province", city "city", county "county", stertreet "stertreet", showorder "showorder", curnumber "curnumber" from cas.branch where branchid = #{branchid}
